# Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayPeriod.Width.narrow

**Case**

The shortest day period width representation.

## Declaration

```swift
case narrow
```

## Modifying a Day Period Width

- **Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayPeriod.Width.abbreviated**: A shortened day period width representation.
- **Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayPeriod.Width.wide**: A full day period width representation.

items.description: A shortened day period width representation.

items.description: A full day period width representation.
